configuration.name: Cut Video Start To End Time

item.itemvalue: Shell Script.Batch Burn Subtitles From SRT
Shell Script.Batch Generate Speech From Text
Shell Script.Batch Merge Video And Audio
Shell Script.Cut Video Start To Duration
Shell Script.Cut Video Start To End Time

task.summary: Default task
Added update to allow auto-speedup when the tts exceeds the length of the SRT frame.
Minor updates including adding alphabet sort to the language list.
Updated the list of functions
Implemented shell temp directory generation to allow multiple instances to run without file conflicts.
Added zoompan cut script for fixed interval zoom-in and zoom-normal effect for videos. This feature can only zoom-in and back to preview zoom... not out and then in.
Added zoompan script to features list
Updated YouTube description and transcript code to include all available languages through a selection box rather than having to hardcode language codes.
Updated YouTube description and transcript code to include all available languages through a selection box rather than having to hardcode language codes.
Updated script reference in workspace.xml
Numerous spell corrections and minor changes
Added CreateMobileCrossclip.sh to allow producing portrait oriented clip with webcam on top in two styles: Basic or Bubble.
Updated workspace.xml to include Create Mobile Crosslip
Updated Features list
Various minor shell script update

Replaced all reference to a hardcoded "TEMP" directory with automatically generated, unique temporary directories managed by tempfile.TemporaryDirectory(). These directories are also automatically cleaned after execution. This will allow for multiple scripts to run concurrently without risk of overlaying files.
Added GenerateGameHighlights.sh as a way to automate trimming and merging multiple videos located in a specified folder.
Corrected temporary directory reference that was incorrect
Corrected temporary directory reference that was incorrect
Updated workspace.xml and .gitignore file references
Added ReverseVideo.sh to create reversed video/audio
Added DownloadYouTubeVideo.sh script to automate downloading videos using yt-dlp
Updated workspace.xml to include new scripts
Replaced youtube-dl with yt-dlp
Minor updates
Add comments
Add comments
Updated function list
Updated function list
updated ignore list
minor spelling changes
Change default path to user home directory for non-Mac dialogs
Renamed translation scripts to have similiar naming to make them easier to identify
Updated workspace.xml to include correct script references and uncheck "execute in terminal" so dialog command displays correctly for non-Mac systems.
Updated function list
Updated ignore list
Updated workspace.xml

Numerous corrections to prevent filenames that might cause scripts to break and an update to allow hypen to be passed to TranslateYouTubeTranscript.py from TranslateYouTubeTranscript.sh, since some video IDs have hyphens.
Minor script changes
Updated audio volume selection to calculate max RMS for audio then compare to frame RMS, rather than use audioop.max since RMS is more like the ear hears audio.
Added del(engine) after runAndWait() to help cleanup after the execution. This appears to have fixed the issue with longer (30+ minute) speech to text conversions failing.
Updated Readme.md to indicate issue with spleeter on M1 causing issues with TTS if the spleeter environment is active when attempting to generate speech from text.
Changes to engine init so it's only initialized once and global engine references are maintained for all later calls

Miscellaneous script changes and addition of a few batch scripts to demonstrate recursively scanning to: burn subittiles, generate TTS, and merge video and audio files. these files can be modified to suite use needs and help in cases where another conversion might have been unsuccessful
Updated script references in configuration
Added condition to cancel if user input is canceled.
Added more extensive comments to each script to make easier for end-users to understand script usage.
Updated readme
Updated readme
Updated readme

MESSAGE.value: Added ReverseVideo.sh to create reversed video/audio
Added DownloadYouTubeVideo.sh script to automate downloading videos using yt-dlp
Updated workspace.xml to include new scripts
Replaced youtube-dl with yt-dlp

updated ignore list
minor spelling changes
Change default path to user home directory for non-Mac dialogs
Renamed translation scripts to have similiar naming to make them easier to identify
Updated workspace.xml to include correct script references and uncheck "execute in terminal" so dialog command displays correctly for non-Mac systems.
Updated function list
Updated ignore list
Updated workspace.xml

Numerous corrections to prevent filenames that might cause scripts to break and an update to allow hypen to be passed to TranslateYouTubeTranscript.py from TranslateYouTubeTranscript.sh, since some video IDs have hyphens.
Minor script changes
Updated audio volume selection to calculate max RMS for audio then compare to frame RMS, rather than use audioop.max since RMS is more like the ear hears audio.
Added del(engine) after runAndWait() to help cleanup after the execution. This appears to have fixed the issue with longer (30+ minute) speech to text conversions failing.
Updated Readme.md to indicate issue with spleeter on M1 causing issues with TTS if the spleeter environment is active when attempting to generate speech from text.
Changes to engine init so it's only initialized once and global engine references are maintained for all later calls

Miscellaneous script changes and addition of a few batch scripts to demonstrate recursively scanning to: burn subittiles, generate TTS, and merge video and audio files. these files can be modified to suite use needs and help in cases where another conversion might have been unsuccessful
Updated script references in configuration
Added condition to cancel if user input is canceled.
Added more extensive comments to each script to make easier for end-users to understand script usage.
Updated readme
